title: Eric Christian Olsen and Sarah Wright
itunes:title: Eric Christian Olsen and Sarah Wright
itunes:subtitle: Make sure to tune in Thursday to hear Eric, Sarah, and the Unqualified team talk to callers! And today, it’s a mini-House Bunny reunion as Anna and Sim welcome the adorable power couple, Sarah Wright and Eric Christian Olsen, to chat about… Memories from
description:
Make sure to tune in Thursday to hear Eric, Sarah, and the Unqualified team talk to callers!

And today, it’s a mini-House Bunny reunion as Anna and Sim welcome the adorable power couple, Sarah Wright and Eric Christian Olsen, to chat about…

 

  • Memories from The House Bunny

 

  • How Eric and Sarah met
  • Anna’s facial expressions
  • Age and gender roles in the industry
  • Red carpet improv with Beige Schumacher Smith

It’s a new year and we thought what better time than now to try out a new format with the show - so, in order to bring you more great content, we're splitting things up a bit! On Tuesdays, you can catch the celebrity interviews and game segments that you know and love and on Thursdays, we'll be airing the caller segments featuring new calls and even revisiting some favorite callers from our archives!

So, don't forget to tune back in on Thursday!!!

 

Follow us!

Anna Faris: @annakfaris

Unqualified: @unqualified

Eric Christian Olsen: @ericcolsen

Sarah Wright: @Swrightolsen

 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
